name: Shine Of Warrior
description: The Shine Of Warrior game is an Action, Platform, and Adventure genre game, with a single competition game which means that only one player plays. In this game there are 6 different types of levels, with different levels of difficulty, where the player is required to defeat every boss in each level, in order to complete the level. Not only defeating bosses, players are also required to collect coins and crystals to increase the existing score, the score is used to buy poison and to buy health.
